column7: READ TABLE VARS ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<VAR>) WITH KEY BAPI_PARAMETER = 'GOODSMVT_ITEM'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'BAPI_VARIABLE' OF STRUCTURE <VAR> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<BAPI_VARIABLE>).
INSERT INITIAL LINE INTO <TABLE> ASSIGNING <LINE> INDEX SY-TABIX.
READ TABLE VARS ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<VAR>) WITH KEY BAPI_PARAMETER = 'TIMETICKETS'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'BAPI_VARIABLE' OF STRUCTURE <VAR> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<BAPI_VARIABLE>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'CONF_NO' OF STRUCTURE <LINE> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<CONF_NO>).
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ZAFO_MO_CONF INTO @DATA(CONF) WHERE RUECK = @<CONF_NO>.
ASSIGN COMPONENT |VGW0{ INDEX }| OF STRUCTURE CONF TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<FROM_VALUE>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT |CONF_ACTIVITY{ INDEX }| OF STRUCTURE <LINE> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<TO_VALUE>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT |YIELD| OF STRUCTURE <LINE> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<SL>).
READ TABLE VARS ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<VAR>) WITH KEY BAPI_PARAMETER = 'DETAIL_RETURN'.
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'BAPI_VARIABLE' OF STRUCTURE <VAR> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<BAPI_VARIABLE>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'CONF_NO' OF STRUCTURE <LINE> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<CONF_NO>).
ASSIGN COMPONENT 'CONF_CNT' OF STRUCTURE <LINE> TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<CONF_CNT>).
READ TABLE RUN->ITEM ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ITEM>) WITH KEY RUECK = <CONF_NO>.
c_value = COND menge_d( WHEN i_value < 0 THEN - i_value ELSE  i_value ).
C_VALUE = COND #( WHEN I_VALUE < 0 THEN '702' ELSE '701' ).
